dcterms:creator: E. Dalin
T. Anne
I. Bergonzani
S. Ivaldi
J.-B. Mouret
dcterms:description: A dataset created by simulating many situations and potential contact positions for a humanoid robot to learn where to put its hand on a wall to avoid falling.
dcterms:title: D-Reﬂex Dataset

dcterms:creator: O. Stasse
T. Anne
J.-B. Mouret
dcterms:description: A dataset containing contact maps for the TALOS humanoid robot, used to determine successful contact positions on a wall to avoid falls.
dcterms:title: Contact Map Dataset

dcterms:description: A testbed used for experiments involving the humanoid robot, providing a controlled environment for testing various scenarios.
dcterms:title: Grid’5000 Testbed

dcterms:description: A dataset generated through simulation to train the neural network for predicting contact positions on a wall.
dcterms:title: Simulation Dataset

dcterms:creator: O. Stasse
T. Anne
J.-B. Mouret
dcterms:description: A dataset related to the TALOS humanoid robot, used for various experiments and simulations in the context of humanoid robotics.
dcterms:title: TALOS Robot Dataset
